Marysville.Lake Stevens School District:
Lake Stevens School District refers to the school district of Lake Stevens, Washington, USA.
There are 6 elementary schools, 2 middle schools, 1 mid-high school, and 2 high schools in this district.


== Schools ==


=== High schools ===
Lake Stevens High School
PROVE High School


=== Mid-High School ===
Cavelero Mid-High School


=== Middle schools ===
Lake Stevens Middle School
North Lake Middle School


=== Elementary schools ===
Glenwood Elementary School
Highland Elementary School
Hillcrest Elementary School
Mt.
